meanings.definition: A person or thing that perfects something.
meanings.sent1: The artist was known as a skilled perfecters of portraits.
meanings.sent2: The perfecters of the recipe added just the right amount of spice.
meanings.sent3: The perfecters of the garden were the busy bees, ensuring every flower bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent4: Her grandmother was the perfecters of knitting, turning yarn into intricate designs.
meanings.sent5: The perfecters of the symphony orchestra tuned each instrument to create harmonious music.
